title: Do I need to offer a sacrifice for entering Mecca without Ihram, though I didn't intend a 2nd Umrah?
transcript: Adnan from the US. Assalamu Alaikum Walaikum Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu. So you wore your Ihram at the Miqat when you were flying. Am I right? Yes or no? That is correct. Seriously this is a PG program but unfortunately we have so many nut cases that speak without knowledge and they keep on saying bogus things.
